title: cryptoaddictchie
author: cryptoaddictchie
content: Anyone send an eth to ben.eth wallet for project psyop? This is a degen that becomes so controversial for the past days. Since the founder of ben (memecoin) has decide to launch its project by presale and accumulated whooping $7m from all those who send. Now some are doubtful that he will launch and rug but he did launch and now its 3x from the presale. I wonder what would be the impact of this to the market esepcially memecoins are really hot now.PS: I send a little bit of eth as degen move dont care if its rug but still up 3x now and still holding.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: I, for one, don't think memecoins are meant to be held for long.I believe one can make money off them by buying and selling off quickly before the dump and when the hype is still on.  Because tomorrow there will be another memecoin in town and the current one will be forgotten, done and dusted.

comments.author: timoshani
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on May 25, 2023, 09:29:15 PMI, for one, don't think memecoins are meant to be held for long.I believe one can make money off them by buying and selling off quickly before the dump and when the hype is still on.  Because tomorrow there will be another memecoin in town and the current one will be forgotten, done and dusted.Meme-coins is clearly a one-off stock. Therefore, I did not send my Ethereum to receive coins from this degen. There is no faith in such projects. More used to trust coins. Moreover, with a quick profit, I am unlucky.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on May 25, 2023, 09:29:15 PMI, for one, don't think memecoins are meant to be held for long.I believe one can make money off them by buying and selling off quickly before the dump and when the hype is still on.  Because tomorrow there will be another memecoin in town and the current one will be forgotten, done and dusted.Depends if the project still persist with a tremendous hype. Its not Im saying memecoin are for long term but some cases those projects moon with a little bit of time too. Like happened on shib, pepe and some new meme too. Ive also in and out of some memecoins but it depends on some factors too like tokenomics and my target gains.Just asking for those who are into socials and seeing frequently news about it and their thoughts.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on May 26, 2023, 12:28:06 AMDepends if the project still persist with a tremendous hype. Its not Im saying memecoin are for long term but some cases those projects moon with a little bit of time too. Like happened on shib, pepe and some new meme too. Ive also in and out of some memecoins but it depends on some factors too like tokenomics and my target gains.Not sure about pepe though, we will see what happens in the next few months. SHIB seems so stagnant lately, but it did make some faithfuls some good profits in the last bull run.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on May 27, 2023, 09:50:47 PMNot sure about pepe though, we will see what happens in the next few months. SHIB seems so stagnant lately, but it did make some faithfuls some good profits in the last bull runI agreed but there are lots of meme to choose from which has considerable multiplier than shib token. Im not into memecoins or long term holder but like I said it will depend on the traction of the project. A meme booms when its hype and thats how you monitor it not on its fundamental cause we all knew memecoins doesnt have one and if they did its really not the matter at all to some flippers.
